The Japanese book I'm looking at has her name in Kanji as "Ko" 
followed by=
 the 'repeat the previous' kanji, and the furigana 
says "ne-"  I'll try to=
 put the Japanese here in SHIFT-JIS: =8Eq=81X=95P
It says she married Maeda=
 Toshitsune: =97=98=8F=ED  AKA Toshimitsu: =97=98=8C=F5
It has her as the s=
econd daughter of Hidetada.  I'll post this to see 
if the Kanji posts alon=
g with it, and then take a look at what I have 
for Senhime again.  And I'm=
 starting to realize that A.L. Sadler is 
not the best author to look to fo=
r correct English romaji spellings 
of Japanese names...
